title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2600.3 - Equal opportunity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2600.3 - Equal opportunity

State Regulations

All activities funded in whole or in part under the

Neighborhood Preservation Companies Program shall be consistent with all
relevant Federal and State equal employment opportunity, nondiscrimination and
fair housing laws. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2600.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
